data.content: Crea un chatbot sobre una tienda de helados.

Here is the YAML content for a Taskyto chatbot designed for an ice cream shop. This includes a top-level menu, a question answering module for common inquiries, and data gathering modules for ordering ice cream and drinks.

```yaml
# -----> File: top_level.yaml <-----
modules:
- name: top-level
  kind: menu
  presentation: |
    Welcome to the Ice Cream Shop! I'm here to help you with your ice cream orders and answer any questions you may have.
  fallback: I'm sorry, I did not get what you said. Can you rephrase?

  items:
  - title: Ice Cream Q&A
    kind: module
    reference: ice_cream_qa
  - title: Order Ice Cream
    memory: full
    kind: module
    reference: order_ice_cream
  - title: Order Drinks
    memory: full
    kind: module
    reference: order_drinks
  - title: Welcome Message
    kind: answer
    answer: |
      Welcome to our Ice Cream Shop! How can I assist you today?
```

```yaml
# -----> File: ice_cream_qa.yaml <-----
name: ice_cream_qa
kind: question_answering
description: Useful for answering questions about the ice cream shop.
questions:
- question: What flavors do you have?
  answer: We offer vanilla, chocolate, strawberry, mint, and cookies & cream.
- question: What are your opening hours?
  answer: We are open every day from 10 AM to 10 PM.
- question: Do you offer vegan options?
  answer: Yes, we have vegan ice cream available in several flavors.
- question: Can I order online?
  answer: Currently, we only accept orders in-store.
```

```yaml
# -----> File: order_ice_cream.yaml <-----
name: order_ice_cream
kind: data_gathering
description: |
  This module gathers information about the ice cream order, including flavor and size.
data:
  - flavor:
      type: enum
      values:
        - vanilla
        - chocolate
        - strawberry
        - mint
        - cookies & cream
  - size:
      type: enum
      values:
        - small
        - medium
        - large

on-success:
  response:
    text: "Thank you for ordering a {size} {flavor} ice cream!"
    rephrase: in-caller
```

```yaml
# -----> File: order_drinks.yaml <-----
name: order_drinks
kind: data_gathering
description: Useful for asking about drinks to accompany the ice cream order.
data:
  - num_drinks:
      type: integer
  - drinks:
      type: enum
      values:
        - soda
        - water
        - juice

on-success:
  response:
    text: "Got it! You ordered {num_drinks} {drinks}."
    rephrase: simple
```

This setup provides a basic structure for your ice cream shop chatbot, allowing users to inquire about flavors and place orders for ice cream and drinks. You can expand upon this by adding more features or modules as needed!
